snippet: After a check in a preseason game in Anaheim on Saturday, Raffi Torres was given the longest suspension in N.H.L. history for a hit on another player.
abstract: NHL bars San Jose Sharks forward Raffi Torres for 41 games, longest suspension in history of league, for illegal check against Anaheim Ducks right wing Jakob Silfverberg in preseason game.
lead_paragraph: After a check in a preseason game in Anaheim on Saturday, Raffi Torres was given the longest suspension in N.H.L. history for a hit on another player.

headline.main: N.H.L. Bars Sharks Forward for Half the Season for an Illegal Hit
